name: Chase
追光
desc:
Chase the light or die in the dark! Don't tap the give up button, avoid your shadow and keep going!!
You are your greatest enemy， but if you are brave, you are your greatest friend. ---Frank

追逐光明或者被黑暗吞噬！永不言弃！避开你的影子，勇敢的前进！！
如果你是懦夫,你就是你自己最大的敌人;但如果你是勇者,你就是你自己最大的朋友。———弗兰克

name: Math Freak
疯狂数学
desc:
Extremely easy. Same as the screenshot.
But Extremely addictive.Please don't install this game if you don't like addictive games.
Be warned, once you start playing, you will not be able to stop! This game is very addicting!
Oh, bet you wont get 20!
[How to play]
> Step1. See the mathematics in the game.
> Step2. Think about it!
> Step3. Make judge in one second!!
> Step4. Beat your friends!!!
